actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for 25 percent of the purchase price of new electric-powered automobiles.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an itemized deduction of 25 percent of the costs incurred in purchasing a qualified electric-powered automobile. Prohibits such deduction for business and investment property for which depreciation or amortization is allowed.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for 25 percent of the purchase price of new electric-powered automobiles.
